marklogic.body: Kim needs a reality check.. First once you have children it's the mother's place to raise her child.. If Kim did not know how to handle a baby she should have not had anymore after her first daughter.. Kim is lazy & a Cry baby.. Kim needs to grow up & get Off her lazy ass.. Kim is to dependable on others instead of being independent.. I firmly believe Kim has never ever worked a day in her life.. How was she a nurse helping others but can't handle her own kids.. Really Kim you need to get a life for real & stop being lazy..
